xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/632599-Audioslave: live debut on the roof of the Ed Sullivan Theater on Broadway in New York City 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/33F5DfWo5JscZUBsJPIaJl6XA5M.jpg The band kicked the show off with their first single "Cochise". Followed by "Light My Way", "Gasoline", a second shot at "Cochise", "Like A Stone", and "Set It Off". The band did Cochise twice, once for Letterman and another time as part of the mini-set. November 25, 2002 Audioslave: live debut on the roof of the Ed Sullivan Theater on Broadway in New York City
